statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, severity FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE location='Office Building';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT incident_date, incident_type FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity <= 3 ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description, location FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity > 4;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE location = 'New York' AND severity BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity >= 3 AND description LIKE '%attack%';
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type FROM security_incidents;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT location, description FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analyst, analysis_result FROM incident_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM security_incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Headquarters%' AND severity < 4;
SELECT * FROM incident_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY incident_id;
SELECT incident_id, analysis_result, analyst FROM incident_analysis WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL ORDER BY incident_id, analyst DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location, COUNT(*) AS incident_count FROM security_incidents GROUP BY location HAVING incident_count > 1 ORDER BY incident_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT id, incident_type, incident_date FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT location, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Cyber Attack';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE is_resolved = FALSE;
SELECT camera_id, location, installation_date FROM security_cameras WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date, location FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE is_resolved = true ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT location, installation_date, resolution FROM security_cameras WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT si.incident_type, sr.report_date, sc.location FROM security_incidents si JOIN incident_reports sr ON si.id = sr.incident_id JOIN security_cameras sc ON sc.location = si.location;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_date, location, severity FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_time, location FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT reporter_name, report_date, report_description FROM IncidentReports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_time, log_description FROM IncidentLogs ORDER BY log_date DESC, log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE severity='High';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports JOIN SecurityIncidents ON IncidentReports.incident_id = SecurityIncidents.incident_id;

SELECT SecurityIncidents.incident_id, IncidentLogs.log_date, IncidentLogs.log_description FROM SecurityIncidents JOIN IncidentLogs ON SecurityIncidents.incident_id = IncidentLogs.incident_id WHERE YEAR(IncidentLogs.log_date) = 2022;

SELECT SecurityIncidents.location, IncidentReports.reporter_name, IncidentLogs.log_description FROM IncidentReports JOIN SecurityIncidents ON IncidentReports.incident_id = SecurityIncidents.incident_id JOIN IncidentLogs ON SecurityIncidents.incident_id = IncidentLogs.incident_id WHERE MONTH(IncidentReports.report_date) = 10;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date, location FROM security_incidents;
SELECT description, incident_type FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incident_responses WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT response_id, response_date, response_text FROM incident_responses ORDER BY response_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE location = 'Headquarters' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date, description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Cyber Attack' AND incident_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, u.email, ir.response_date FROM users u JOIN incident_responses ir ON u.user_id = ir.user_id ORDER BY ir.response_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT d.device_type, d.installation_date, s.incident_type FROM devices d JOIN incidents_devices id ON d.device_id = id.device_id JOIN security_incidents s ON id.incident_id = s.incident_id WHERE d.status = 'Active';

SELECT i.incident_type, COUNT(ir.user_id) AS total_responses FROM security_incidents i LEFT JOIN incident_responses ir ON i.incident_id = ir.incident_id GROUP BY i.incident_type ORDER BY total_responses DESC LIMIT 5;
